 Ã‚Âº                                                                            Ã‚Âº
 Ã‚Âº                                                                            Ã‚Âº
 Ã‚Âº   Release date........... 2004-11-18     Game Genre......... Action/FPS    Ã‚Âº
 Ã‚Âº   Cracker........ EMPORiO/APE/oWNAGE     Fixes.......... STEAM/CD-Check    Ã‚Âº

 Ã‚Âº   This is  simply a  repack of  needed files to run Half-Life 2 without    Ã‚Âº
 Ã‚Âº   STEAM activation or disc in drive.The ape patch for the nuked EMPORiO    Ã‚Âº
 Ã‚Âº   release seem to work for some people but still with ai_disabled error    Ã‚Âº
 Ã‚Âº   However  even this pack  contains binaries modified by ape some files    Ã‚Âº
 Ã‚Âº   were still missing to run the game without glitches or steam failures    Ã‚Âº
 Ã‚Âº                                                                            Ã‚Âº 
 Ã‚Âº   Follow the steps below to play proper without STEAM/CD:                  Ã‚Âº
 Ã‚Âº                                                                            Ã‚Âº
 Ã‚Âº                                                                            Ã‚Âº
 Ã‚Âº   1. Unrar all files into your HalfLife2 folder *replace existing files    Ã‚Âº
 Ã‚Âº   2. Run Launcher.exe.                                                     Ã‚Âº
 Ã‚Âº   3. Play the game.                                                        Ã‚Âº
 Ã‚Âº                                                                            Ã‚Âº
 Ã‚Âº   This works  with  the EMPORiO  release so far - not INYOFACE CloneCD.    Ã‚Âº
 Ã‚Âº   Most credits are going to EMPORiO (RIP) for their CS:S files used.       Ã‚Âº
 Ã‚Âº                                                                            Ã‚Âº
 Ã‚Âº   If you like the game: buy it. If you don't like it: don't play it ;)     Ã‚Âº
